subject: Add product in order #SSN5153
description_text:
Ciao!
I just ordered the "Simsonn Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal with Haptic
Reactor Optional" including the haptic reactor.

*Order #SSN5153 *

I forgot to add the new U-Shaped Mounting Bracket for throttle and brake.

Is it possible to add them in my order?
Moreover, I'm Italy based, will the power supply have our EU standard power
plug?

thank you!

Michele

conversations.body_text: Hi Michele Pasquali,   Already added for you

Thank you!
You're incredibile!

About the power plug can you confirm me that it has the EU standard?

Many thanks!
Michele

Il lun 22 dic 2025, 12:43 support@simsonn.com
Hi Michele Pasquali,       We offer multiple plug types. For orders shipped to the EU, an EU plug will be provided by default.

Thank you!
I'm so happy!

Il lun 22 dic 2025, 13:17 support@simsonn.com

good afternoon,
package is arrived, unfortunately usb cable is missing.

ciao,
Michele

Il giorno lun 22 dic 2025 alle ore 13:48 Michele Pasquali <
mic.pasquali@gmail.com> ha scritto:

> Thank you!
> I'm so happy!
>
> Il lun 22 dic 2025, 13:17 support@simsonn.com

ciao again,
I just finished to set up on my rig, used another standard usb and just
after few minutes connecting it the usb hub smells weird and device is no
longer detected, it seems like something is burning inside .

can you please help?
Michele
